item.title: 8 activites to build self-confidence
item.description: I believed I had to had born confident. And I wasnâ€™t, so why keep trying? How happy I am to have been wrong about that! This post brings some exercises from the book â€œThe Confidence Code: The Science and Art of Self-Assurance - What women should knowâ€, and some lessons from my Cognitive Behaviour Therapy sessions. Start practicing these 8 keys activities and see how you feel a few weeks from now.
